name: BREAKSTONE'S Triple Chocolate Bliss Cake
author: Anonymous
summary: This triple chocolate cake drizzled with chocolate and topped with whipped topping and raspberries will satisfy the strongest chocolate craving.
ingredients: 1 cup BREAKSTONE'S Reduced Fat Sour Cream
1 pkg. (4 serving size)  JELL-O Chocolate Instant Pudding
3 cups thawed COOL WHIP Whipped Topping, divided
directions: Lightly grease 12-cup fluted tube pan or 10-inch tube pan
Beat all ingredients except whipped topping, chocolate and raspberries in large bowl with electric mixer on low speed just until moistened
Beat on medium speed 2 minutes scraping bowl occasionally
Bake 50 minutes to 1 hour or until wooden toothpick inserted near center comes out clean
Loosen cake from side of pan with knife or metal spatula and gently remove cake
Cool cake completely on wire rack
Microwave remaining whipped topping and chocolate in microwaveable bowl on HIGH 1-1/2 to 2 minutes or until chocolate is completely melted and mixture is well blended, stirring after each min
Immediately drop reserved whipped topping, by scant teaspoonfuls, around top of cake; create star shape by drawing wooden toothpick through middle several times
Spoon raspberries into center of cake
